column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Two transsexual suspects were arrested for theft. According to sources
column6: in Sangkat Tuol Svay Prey II
column8: the two suspects managed to open the car door and stole bags with money and two mobile phones; an iPhone11 Pro and an iPhone X Mac. ------The source said that since the phone was connected to the GPS
column9: the owner of the phone tracked it down as one of the suspects took it to pawn at a shop
column10: and asked the authorities to intervene.------The arrest happened at 1:20 pm on October 1
column13: Phnom Penh.------The suspect and the victim were not identified.------The two suspects were sent to the Boeung Keng Kang District Police Inspectorate for questioning. ------POST NEWS
